institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 5 (Deliberation Member Qualifications)
contents: Article 5 (Qualifications of Deliberation Committee Members) ① Deliberation Committee members are those who fall under any of the following items and are appointed through public recruitment, external recommendation, etc. However, directors in charge of the corporation's ISC project, public officials at the director, section, or team leader levels of related central administrative agencies such as the Ministry of Employment and Labor, and executives of worker organizations and employers' organizations may be appointed as ex officio members. Revised December 31, 2019, 1. Those who are or have experience working as an associate professor (research member) or higher; 2. Those in related fields (mechanics, electricity/electronics, information and communications, office management, budget/accounting, human resource development, A person with more than 7 years of experience (human resource management, etc.) who is or has worked at an executive level or higher in a company, etc. 3. A person working in a related field in the industry (machinery, electricity/electronics, information and communication, office management, human resource development, human resources) 4. A person who falls under Article 4, Paragraph 2 and is recognized by the Corporation as having expert knowledge on ISC operation and business performance; ② A deliberation committee member approves Article 5-2 Notwithstanding the reasons set forth in paragraph 2, if the committee member does not avoid deliberation and resolution of the agenda, the chairperson may dismiss the committee member ex officio. Newly established 2019. 12. 31.
